mapper.sql: a.BLYJ,a.ID, a. GZBLDH, a. FJZCH, a. FXJLDH, a. JLBYM, a. IS_M, a. MEL, a. ZJH, a. SC_BLRID, a. SC_ZZH, a. SC_SQRQ, a. SC_DQRQ, a. SC_PZRID, a. SC_NR, a. ZC_BLRID, a. ZC_ZZH, a. ZC_SQRQ, a. ZC_DQRQ, a. ZC_PZRID, a. ZC_NR, a. DQRQ, a. GZMS, a. BZ, a. ZT, a. WHDWID, a. WHRID, a. WHSJ, a. DPRTCODE, a. GBRID, a. GBRQ, a. GBSM, b.ZWMS ZJZWMS, case a.zt when 1 then '保存' when 2 then '提交' when 8 then '作废' when 9 then '关闭' when 10 then '完成' else '' end ZTSTR
mapper.select:
select * from ( select b1.id, b1.gzbldh, b1.fjzch, b1.fxjldh, b1.jlbym, b1.sc_nr, b1.zc_nr, b1.is_m, b1.mel, b1.zjh||' '||e.zwms zjh, e.zwms ZJZWMS, b1.sc_blrid,
sc_blr.blrxx sc_blrxx, b1.sc_zzh, b1.sc_sqrq, b1.sc_dqrq, b1.dqrq, b1.sc_pzrid, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = b1.sc_pzrid) sc_pzrxx, b1.zc_blrid,
zc_blr.blrxx zc_blrxx,
b1.zc_zzh, b1.zc_sqrq, b1.zc_dqrq, b1.zc_pzrid, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = b1.zc_pzrid) zc_pzrxx,
b1.gzms, b1.bz, b1.zt, b1.whdwid, b1.whrid, (select t_user.username || ' ' || t_user.realname from t_user where t_user.id = b1.whrid) whrxx, b1.whsj, b1.dprtcode,
dept.dprtname dprtname, b1.gbrid,
gbr.gbrxx , whr.realname,whr.username,whr.id WHR_ID, b1.gbrq, b1.gbsm, b2.gdxx from b_s_013 b1 left join t_department dept on dept.id = b1.dprtcode left join (select username || ' ' || realname gbrxx,id from t_user) gbr on gbr.id = b1.gbrid left join (select username || ' ' || realname blrxx,id from t_user) zc_blr on zc_blr.id = b1.zc_blrid left join (select username || ' ' || realname blrxx,id from t_user) sc_blr on sc_blr.id = b1.sc_blrid
left join d_005 e on e.zjh = b1.zjh AND B1.DPRTCODE = E.DPRTCODE left join t_user whr on whr.id = b1.WHRID left join (select c.mainid, string_agg(c.gdlx || '##' || c.gdzlx || '##' || c.gdbh ||'##'||c.XGGDID|| '##' || c.zt,',') gdxx from (select a1.mainid, a1.gdlx, a2.gdlx gdzlx, a2.gdbh, a2.zt ,a1.XGGDID from b_s_01301 a1 join b_g_007 a2 on a1.xggdid = a2.id and a1.gdlx = 2 and a1.zt = 1 union all select a1.mainid, a1.gdlx, 0 gdzlx, a2.gdbh, a2.zt ,a1.XGGDID from b_s_01301 a1 join b_g_010 a2 on a1.xggdid = a2.id and a1.gdlx = 3 and a1.zt = 1) c group by mainid) b2 on b2.mainid = b1.id
where 1 = 1 and b1.zt in (1, 2, 9, 10)
and b1.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and b1.fjzch = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND exists ( SELECT 1 from D_007 where b1.fjzch = FJZCH AND b1.dprtcode = DPRTCODE AND zt = 1 )
AND exists ( SELECT 1 from V_ROLE_JX where b1.fjzch= FJZCH AND b1.dprtcode = DPRTCODE AND USER_ID = #{paramsMap.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
and b1.mel = #{mel}
and b1.is_m = cast(#{isM} as NUMERIC)
and b1.zt = cast(#{zt} as NUMERIC)
and b1.sc_sqrq >= to_timestamp(#{paramsMap.sqrqStart, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and b1.sc_sqrq <= to_timestamp(#{paramsMap.sqrqEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and b1.dqrq >= to_timestamp(#{paramsMap.dqrqStart, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and b1.dqrq <= to_timestamp(#{paramsMap.dqrqEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and b1.gbrq >= to_timestamp(#{paramsMap.gbrqStart, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and b1.gbrq <= to_timestamp(#{paramsMap.gbrqEnd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
and ( b1.gzbldh like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or (b1.fjzch like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') or (b1.fxjldh like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') or (b1.jlbym like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') or (b1.gzms like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
or (sc_blr.blrxx like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) or (zc_blr.blrxx like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) or (gbr.gbrxx like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) or (dept.dprtname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) or (b1.mel like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) or (b1.zjh like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) or (e.zwms like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) )
order by b1.zt asc,b1.dqrq asc
order by b1.${pagination.sort} ${pagination.order}
) b3 where 1=1
mapper.insert:
insert into B_S_013 (ID, GZBLDH, FJZCH, FXJLDH, JLBYM, IS_M, MEL, ZJH, SC_BLRID, SC_ZZH, SC_SQRQ, SC_DQRQ, SC_PZRID, SC_NR, ZC_BLRID, ZC_ZZH, ZC_SQRQ, ZC_DQRQ, ZC_PZRID, ZC_NR, DQRQ, GZMS, BZ, ZT, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ, DPRTCODE, GBRID, GBRQ, GBSM ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gzbldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jlbym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cast(#{isM,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as integer),#{mel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scZzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zcBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zcZzh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zcSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zcDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zcPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zcNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cast(#{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as integer) , #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gbsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into B_S_013
ID,
GZBLDH,
FJZCH,
FXJLDH,
JLBYM,
IS_M,
MEL,
ZJH,
SC_BLRID,
SC_ZZH,
SC_SQRQ,
SC_DQRQ,
SC_PZRID,
SC_NR,
ZC_BLRID,
ZC_ZZH,
ZC_SQRQ,
ZC_DQRQ,
ZC_PZRID,
ZC_NR,
DQRQ,
GZMS,
BZ,
ZT,
WHDWID,
WHRID,
DPRTCODE,
GBRID,
GBRQ,
GBSM,
BLYJ,
WHSJ
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gzbldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fxjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{jlbym,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cast(#{isM,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as integer),
#{mel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scZzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{scDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{scPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zcBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zcZzh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{zcSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{zcDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{zcPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zcNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cast(#{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as integer),
#{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gbsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{blyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update B_S_013
GZBLDH = #{gzbldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FXJLDH = #{fxjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JLBYM = #{jlbym,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_M = cast(#{isM,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as integer),
MEL = #{mel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJH = #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SC_BLRID = #{scBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SC_ZZH = #{scZzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SC_SQRQ = #{scSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SC_DQRQ = #{scDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SC_PZRID = #{scPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SC_NR = #{scNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZC_BLRID = #{zcBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZC_ZZH = #{zcZzh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZC_SQRQ = #{zcSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZC_DQRQ = #{zcDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ZC_PZRID = #{zcPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZC_NR = #{zcNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DQRQ = #{dqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GZMS = #{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZT = cast(#{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as integer),
WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GBRID = #{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GBRQ = #{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GBSM = #{gbsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BLYJ = #{blyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHSJ = current_timestamp
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_S_013 set WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = current_timestamp, GBRID = #{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBRQ = current_timestamp, ZT = cast(#{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} as integer), GBSM = #{gbsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update B_S_013 set GZBLDH = #{gzbldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FJZCH = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FXJLDH = #{fxjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JLBYM = #{jlbym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_M = #{isM,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MEL = #{mel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJH = #{zjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SC_BLRID = #{scBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SC_ZZH = #{scZzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SC_SQRQ = #{scSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SC_DQRQ = #{scDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SC_PZRID = #{scPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SC_NR = #{scNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZC_BLRID = #{zcBlrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZC_ZZH = #{zcZzh,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZC_SQRQ = #{zcSqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZC_DQRQ = #{zcDqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZC_PZRID = #{zcPzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZC_NR = #{zcNr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DQRQ = #{dqrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GZMS = #{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GBRID = #{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GBRQ = #{gbrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GBSM = #{gbsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select b1.id, b1.gzbldh, b1.fjzch, b1.fxjldh, b1.jlbym, b1.is_m, b1.mel, b1.zjh, b1.sc_blrid, b1.sc_zzh, b1.sc_sqrq, b1.sc_dqrq, b1.sc_pzrid, b1.sc_nr, b1.zc_blrid, b1.zc_zzh, b1.zc_sqrq, b1.zc_dqrq, b1.zc_pzrid, b1.zc_nr, b1.dqrq, b1.gzms, b1.bz, b1.zt, b1.whdwid, b1.whrid, b1.whsj, b1.dprtcode, b1.gbrid, b1.gbrq, b1.gbsm from b_s_013 b1 inner join b_s_006 b2 on b1.fxjldh = b2.fxjldh where b1.fjzch = #{fjzch,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b1.dprtcode = #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ((b1.zt = 2 and #{fxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= b2.fxrq and #{fxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} <= b1.dqrq) or (b1.zt in (9, 10) and #{fxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} >= b2.fxrq and #{fxrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} <= b1.gbrq))
